The '''Battle of Eglarest''' was a battle fought early during the [[War of Wrath]]. 

== The Battle ==
At the head of the battle was [[Ingwion]], son of [[Ingwë]], leading the [[Vanyar]]in host. At [[Eglarest]] Ingwion and his host made a landing and found a swarm of [[Orcs]] around it. Thereafter he and his host drove away the Orcs from the shores of the [[Belegaer]].<ref>{{LR|AB}}, p. 144</ref> Nothing more is said of the battle in detail.
